title: Horizontal
subtitle: Flat packshot photography
description: Shoot your flat packshot with Horizontal machine. The Ipad Pro allows you to configure the light and the camera. Horizontal guarantees you the possibility of styling and photographing your products flat with the automatic removal of the background.

steps.title: Take charge
steps.description: We can take care of the entire shoot for your products.

steps.title: Production
steps.description: Taking photos in our studio with personalized support.

steps.title: Retouching
steps.description: For an optimal rendering, the E-Do team can take care of the retouching of your visuals.

steps.title: Delivery
steps.description: Delivery of your files ready to use for all your marketing needs.
